sentences.en: He didn't attempt to dissimulate or conceal his true feelings.
sentences.cn: 他没有尝试着掩饰或隐瞒自己的感受。

sentences.en: Paulson's inability to dissimulate is at times endearing.
sentences.cn: 有些时候,保尔森不善伪装的性格显得可爱.

sentences.en: Since he engaged Iran, it has continued to temporise and dissimulate over its nuclear programme.
sentences.cn: 自从他介入伊朗核问题以来,该国一直遮遮掩掩,左右逢源.

sentences.en: They were decked out in tracksuits, seemingly to dissimulate their true function.
sentences.cn: 他们都穿着田径服，似乎想掩饰他们的真实职能。

sentences.en: This man was too injured to dissimulate well.
sentences.cn: 这个人受伤严重，无法完全遮掩住。

trans.tran_cn: 掩饰, 假装, 装糊涂
trans.tran_en: to hide your true feelings or intentions, especially by lying
